event.title: was attacked by Boko Haram in May 2013

data.event: The town was attacked by Boko Haram in May 2013 and February 2014.
On September 2, 2014, Boko Haram seized control of Bama, according to the town's residents.
In December 2014, it was reported that "people too elderly to flee Gwoza Local Government Area were being rounded up and taken to two schools where the militants opened fire on them."
